title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7051.3 - Facility policies and procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7051.3 - Facility policies and procedures

State Regulations

Each local correctional facility shall develop written
policies and procedures concerning funeral and deathbed visits consistent with

Correction Law, section 509, and the requirements of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7051.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
